active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the pros and cons of using tape media for backups in a modern cybersecurity context (e.g., cost vs. sequential access delays, sanitization challenges). How does it fit into asset security compared to cloud or disk alternatives? Support with NIST SP 800-88 references.
